README.md

Hi! I'm Kenneth. I hope you like my website :) I am a software engineer from Hong Kong who is currently in my final year of university. I have always been a creative person since I was young. Thinking outside the box is my number one strength because I hate being told something is impossible. When I set my mind to something, I will do everything in my power to achieve it. There is no such thing as "Impossible" in my dictionary, only "How long will it take?"

That's why when I graduated from high school, I knew I wanted to study something that challenges me and allows me to think creatively, but also contribute to the world in a meaningful way. And that, my friends, is Computer Science and Finance. In my university years, I have been fortunate enough to gain experience in both fields through internships and personal projects. I am passionate about using technology to solve real-world problems, and I believe that finance is a powerful tool for creating positive change in society.

‚ÄúPeople should pursue what they‚Äôre passionate about. That will make them happier than pretty much anything else.‚Äù
